ack.p: We express our sincere gratitude to Shawi community members in Balsapuerto district including authorities and research assistants for guiding us through their territory and nuances of their culture. Thanks to Shawi male, female and youth participants in the Photovoice activity for engagement with this investigation. Thanks to the personal of Red de Salud Alto Amazonas, for their suggestions and support to this investigation. Thanks to Matthew King, for assistance in designing figures in this article. Victoria Edge, Shuaib Lwasa, and Didacus B. Namanya are participating members of the Indigenous Health and Adaptation to Climate Change (IHACC) Team.
